description: Easy to make and budget friendly, this cream of celery soup recipe is a hearty, flavoursome dish and sure to be a hit with the family.
name: Cream Of Celery Soup Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Remove saucepan from heat. Using a stick blender, blend until smooth, then stir through cream. Add celery salt and ground white pepper, then stir to combine. Ladle soup into bowls, swirl through extra cream, then serve topped with croutons and celery leaves.
